mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jgv.review (re_content, re_created_at, re_updated_at, re_deleted_at, re_liked, mo_num, us_num) VALUES (#{reContent}, #{reCreatedAt}, #{reUpdatedAt}, #{reDeletedAt},#{reLiked}, #{moNum}, #{usNum})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM jgv.review WHERE mo_num = #{id} AND re_deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT r.re_num AS 'reNum', r.re_content AS 'reContent', r.re_created_at AS 'reCreatedAt', r.re_updated_at AS 'reUpdatedAt', r.re_deleted_at AS 'reDeletedAt', r.re_liked AS 'reLiked', r.mo_num AS 'moNum', r.us_num AS 'usNum', u.us_nickname AS 'usNickName' FROM jgv.review r LEFT JOIN jgv.user u on u.us_num = r.us_num WHERE mo_num = #{id} AND re_deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY re_num DESC LIMIT #{limitCount} OFFSET #{offsetCount}

SELECT re_num AS 'reNum', re_content AS 'reContent', re_created_at AS 'reCreatedAt', re_updated_at AS 'reUpdatedAt', re_deleted_at AS 'reDeletedAt', mo_num AS 'moNum', us_num AS 'usNum', re_liked AS 'reLiked' FROM jgv.review WHERE re_num = #{reviewId}
mapper.update: UPDATE jgv.review SET re_content = #{reContent}, re_updated_at = NOW() WHERE re_num = #{reNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jgv.review WHERE us_num = #{userId} AND re_deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT r.re_num AS reNum, r.re_content AS reContent, r.re_liked AS reLiked, r.us_num AS usNum, r.mo_num AS moNum, r.re_created_at AS reCreatedAt, u.us_nickname AS usNickName, m.mo_title AS moTitle, mi.m_img_num AS mImgNum, mi.m_img_url AS mImgUrl FROM jgv.review r LEFT JOIN jgv.user u on u.us_num = r.us_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie m on m.mo_num = r.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image mi on m.mo_num = mi.mo_num WHERE r.us_num = #{userId} AND re_deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT #{limitCount} OFFSET #{offsetCount}
